# NSMetadataItemFSSizeKey | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Foundation ](/documentation/foundation)

- [ NSMetadataItemFSSizeKey ](/documentation/Foundation/NSMetadataItemFSSizeKey)

-  NSMetadataItemFSSizeKey 

Global Variable# NSMetadataItemFSSizeKey

iOS 5.0+iPadOS 5.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.7+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
let NSMetadataItemFSSizeKey: String
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/Foundation/NSMetadataItemFSSizeKey#Discussion)

The value is an [`NSNumber`](/documentation/foundation/nsnumber) object that indicates the size (in bytes) of the file on disk.
